contentList.content: The elements rage within you, allowing you to invoke their powers.
Once per long rest, if you would fall below a third of your hit points after suffering an attack, enter the <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="AVATARSTATE">Avatar State</LSTag>.

Your soul is pure Fire, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING_MES">Scorching</LSTag> enemies that are close and granting you <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Fear</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blindness</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">Burning</LSTag> and [1]. You cannot be Enwebbed, Entangled or Ensnared.

You inflict [1] with spells and attacks. When you deal [2], the target must succeed a Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or begin <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING_SOULFIRE">Burning</LSTag>.
Your skin becomes icy crystal, reducing the damage from all sources and increasing your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> by 2. You are <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immune</LSTag> to [1].

You inflict [1] with spells and attacks. When you deal [2] you also inflict <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_FROST">Frostbite</LSTag>. Enemies find it <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">difficult</LSTag> to approach you and are inflicted with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MES_FROST">Abyssal Frost</LSTag> every turn.

Lightning courses through your veins, granting you doubled <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag>, an additional <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SHOCKED">Shock</LSTag> and [1].

You inflict [1] with spells and attacks. When you deal [2], the target must succeed a Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SHOCKED_SURFACE">Electrocuted</LSTag>. <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SHOCKED">Shock</LSTag> enemies around you in combat.

Your body echoes a maelstrom of wind and thunder, granting you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FREEDOM_OF_MOVEMENT">Freedom of Movement</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly">Flight</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to [1]. You cannot take fall damage.

You inflict [1] with spells and attacks. When you deal [2], the target must succeed a Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or it is inflicted with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_THUNDER_REVERBERATION">Reverberation</LSTag>. <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blind</LSTag> enemies around you in combat.
Become <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to physical damage for [1] turns. You gain an additional <LSTag Tooltip="Action">Action</LSTag> and heal for [2] at the start of every turn.

Your spells and attacks deal an additional [1], your <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> threshold is reduced by [2], and you can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="MES_AVATARCont">Primaeval Spells</LSTag>. Enemies around you are inflicted with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Fear</LSTag>.
Affected entity has invoked the element of Fire. Spells and Attacks deal an additional [1] for [2] turns.
Affected entity has invoked the element of Cold. Spells and Attacks deal an additional [1] for [2] turns.
Affected entity has invoked the element of Lightning. Spells and Attacks deal an additional [1] for [2] turns.
Affected entity has invoked the element of Thunder. Spells and Attacks deal an additional [1] for [2] turns.
Ignite your <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="CINDERSOUL">Soul</LSTag> and gain <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="AVATARPASSIVESFIRE">Raging Flames</LSTag>.
Freeze your <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="ICYSKIN">Skin</LSTag> and gain <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="AVATARPASSIVESCOLD">Abyss Walker</LSTag>.
Electrify your <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="ELECTRICEMBRACE">Blood</LSTag> and gain <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="AVATARPASSIVESLIGHTNING">Eye of the Storm</LSTag>.
Free your <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="THUNDERTEMPEST">Body</LSTag> and gain <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="AVATARPASSIVESTHUNDER">Echoing Calamity</LSTag>.

Invoke <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FREEZINGCOLD">Freezing Frost</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SEARINGHEAT">Searing Heat</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARGEDLIGHTNING">Charged Lightning</LSTag>, or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BOOMINGTHUNDER">Crashing Thunder</LSTag> and damage nearby foes.

Attune with element you have <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_MES_Invoke">Invoked</LSTag> to become an avatar of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="AVATARSTATECOLD">Cold</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="AVATARSTATEFIRE">Fire</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="AVATARSTATELIGHTNING">Lightning</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="AVATARSTATETHUNDER">Thunder</LSTag>.
Explode with elemental energy for [2], gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SEARINGHEAT">Searing Heat</LSTag> for [1] turns.
Explode with elemental energy for [2], gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FREEZINGCOLD">Freezing Frost</LSTag> for [1] turns.
Explode with elemental energy for [2], gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARGEDLIGHTNING">Charged Lightning</LSTag> for [1] turns.
Explode with elemental energy for [2], gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BOOMINGTHUNDER">Crashing Thunder</LSTag> for [1] turns.

Allow <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="AVATARSTATECOLD">Cold</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="AVATARSTATEFIRE">Fire</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="AVATARSTATELIGHTNING">Lightning</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="AVATARSTATETHUNDER">Thunder</LSTag> to flow through you to gain Elemental <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="ELEMENTALHARMONY">Harmony</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="ELEMENTALCHAOS">Chaos</LSTag>.

Affected entity has become a vessel for primordial forces, gaining Elemental <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="ELEMENTALHARMONY">Harmony</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="ELEMENTALCHAOS">Chaos</LSTag>.
Revoke the elements you are attuned to, causing a shockwave to erupt from your body for [1]. This action will end your Avatar State(s).

Command ancient primordial forces to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_MES_Fireball">Flames of the Fifth Phoenix</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_MES_IceStorm">Shriek of the Sixth Summit</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_MES_ChainLightning">Strike of the Seventh Storm</LSTag>, and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_MES_DestructiveWave">Eye of the Eighth Ego</LSTag>
Emit a shockwave of thunder that damages nearby creatures and knocks them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Strike an enemy with lightning. Six more bolts will leap from the target, electrifying as many as six other enemies within [1].
Fangs of ice and hail crash from the sky and freeze the area, leaving icy terrain for 2 turns and applying <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_FROST">Frostbite</LSTag> to foes.
Shoot a bright flame from your fingers that explodes upon contact, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING_MES">Scorching</LSTag> everything in the vicinity.

Focus elemental energy to gain a unique boon and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FREEZINGCOLD">Freezing Frost</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SEARINGHEAT">Searing Heat</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARGEDLIGHTNING">Charged Lightning</LSTag>, or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BOOMINGTHUNDER">Crashing Thunder</LSTag> for 2 turns.

Increase your Armour Class by [1] and become resistant to physical damage for 1 turn.

Gain Freezing Frost for 2 turns.

Your attacks are guaranteed critical hits for 1 turn.

Gain Searing Heat for 2 turns.

Attacks made against you have disadvantage for 1 turn.

Gain Charged Lightning for 2 turns.

All of your ability checks are made with advantage for 1 turn.

Gain Crashing Thunder for 2 turns.
Teleport to a target and strike them with your weapon, infused with an element you have invoked or attuned.
Teleport to a target and strike them with your fist, infused with an element you have invoked or attuned.

Teleport and Frostbite a target.

Requires Freezing Frost or Cold Attunement.

Teleport and Burn a target.

Requires Searing Heat or Fire Attunement.

Teleport and Electrocute a target.

Requires Charged Lightning or Lightning Attunement.

Teleport and Reverberate a target.

Requires Crashing Thunder or Thunder Attunement.

Perform two unarmed <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> to rapidly strike with bursts of elemental energy. Gain either <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FREEZINGCOLD">Freezing Frost</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SEARINGHEAT">Searing Heat</LSTag> for 2 turns.

Rapidly strike a target area with two blasts of fire energy, creating a fire surface in a 1m zone.

Gain Searing Heat for 2 turns.

Rapidly strike a target area with two shards of cold energy, creating a frozen surface in a 1m zone.

Gain Freezing Frost for 2 turns.

Bend the element of Air to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_MES_Invisibility">Invisibility</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="MES_Throw">Throw</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_MES_Pull">Pull</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_MES_Fog">Fog</LSTag>, and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_MES_ElectrifiedCloud">Stormcloud</LSTag>.
Throw a creature or object up to [1] by bending the air around it.
Bend the wind surrounding a target area to pull creatures and objects toward you.

Bend the air around a creature and turn them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MES_CLOAK">Invisible</LSTag> for [1] turns. Attacks against it have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> and it attacks with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.

Has Advantage on Attack Rolls and imposes Disadvantage on enemy Attack Rolls.

Invisibility ends early if the invisible entity takes damage.

Bend the element of Earth to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_MES_LavaSurface">Create Lava</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_MES_EarthStomp">Roar of Gaia</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="MES_StoneWall">Wall of Stone</LSTag>, and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_MES_MetalSkin">Metal Skin</LSTag>.
Harden earth into metal and coat a target with it, increasing their <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> by [1] for [2] turns.
The <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> of this entity is increased by [1].
Raise a wall of solid stone.
Strike the earth with a heavy blow to overwhelm nearby creatures and possibly knock them off balance. For [1] turns you can bend the trembling earth to erupt again in a target area.
Erupt the earth in a target area you can see.

Bend the element of Water to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_HealingWater">Heal</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_CuringWater">Cure</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_MES_Bleed">Languish of Ichor</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_MES_ColdSurface">Freeze</LSTag>, and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_MES_WaterCreate">Create Water</LSTag>.
Direct ki externally to accelerate healing.
Direct ki internally to alleviate illness and disease.
Rip through the veins of up to 3 creatures, causing them to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">Bleed</LSTag> for [1] turns.

Bend the element of Fire to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_MES_FlameBlade">Flameblade</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_MES_FireShield">Fireshield</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_MES_Ignite">Ignite</LSTag>, and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_MES_Explode">Sphere of Destruction</LSTag>.
Create an enchanted blade of fire that can be equipped.
Create an enchanted blade of fire that can be equipped.
<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING_MES">Scorch</LSTag> a target within range.
Lob a sphere of volatile flames. If any targets in the area are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING_MES">Scorched</LSTag>, they will explode for [1].
Freeze the area and create an ice surface in a [1] radius.
Churn the molten earth to create a lava surface in a [1] radius.
Charge the air with lightning to create an electrified cloud in a [1] radius.
Bend the air to mask the area with a fog cloud in a [1] radius.
Warp to an area and electrify your surroundings.

Channel raw elemental energy to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_MES_FlameStrike">Fierce Flame</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_MES_ConeOfCold">Roaring Rime</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_MES_CallLightning">Lingering Lightning</LSTag>, and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_MES_ThunderBolt">Terrifying Thunder</LSTag>.
Ignite the air causing it to flare and combust in a pillar of flame, leaving scorched terrain in the target area for 3 turns.
Emit a freezing torrent of ice, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">Burning</LSTag> targets undergo rapid cooling and become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BRITTLE">Brittle</LSTag>.
Lightning strikes all targets within range, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SHOCKED_SURFACE">Electrocuting</LSTag> them.
Unleash a tempest from your hands, ripping through the air and pushing back foes, inflicting them with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Fear</LSTag>.
When you deal Fire damage, the target must succeed a Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or begin <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING_SOULFIRE">Burning</LSTag>.
When you deal Lightning damage, the target must succeed a Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SHOCKED_SURFACE">Electrocuted</LSTag>.

When you deal Thunder damage, the target must succeed a Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_THUNDER_REVERBERATION">Reverberated</LSTag>.
Affected entity will burn for [1] at the start of each turn.
Affected entity is being scorched for [1] at the start of each turn.
Affected entity will freeze for [1] at the end of each turn, and its movement speed is halved.
When you deal Cold damage, the target must succeed a Strength <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_FROST">Frosted</LSTag>.

You unlock your latent potential and become one with the elements. Gain the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_MES_Invoke">Invoke</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_MES_Attune">Attune</LSTag> and enter the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_MES_Avatar">Avatar State</LSTag> when in danger.
You are overflowing with elemental Ki and gain the understanding to channel it. Gain [1] <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="KiPoint">Ki Points</LSTag>.
Your connection to magic is unique and grants your mind clarity when spellcasting. Gain [1] level [2] <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slots</LSTag>.
Your powers do not need to be earned, simply used. Gain [1] Sorcery Points.
You take hits like you were meant for them, brushing off blades and bolts while asking for more. Heal for [1] when you take physical damage.
Your steps are light, your movement is shadow. Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Stealth">Stealth</LSTag> checks.
Your oath is everything to you, for good or for ill. Gain [1] <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelOath">Channel Oath Charges</LSTag>.
Your deity rewards your faith. Gain [1] <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelDivinity">Channel Divinity Charges</LSTag>.
Martial techniques have become effortless for you from rigourous training. Gain [1] <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SuperiorityDie">Superiority Die</LSTag>.
Few strive for such balance. Fewer still achieve it. Increase all <LSTag Tooltip="Abilities">Ability Scores</LSTag> by 1.

You unlock the full potential of an elemental <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_MES_Invoke">Invocation</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_MES_Attune">Attunement</LSTag>, extending their durations until long rest. Each element permanently increases an <LSTag Tooltip="Abilities">Ability</LSTag> by 1, and grants you <LSTag Type="Tooltip" Tooltip="Expertise">Expertise</LSTag> in a <LSTag Tooltip="Skill">Skill</LSTag>.

Your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> increases by 1 and you gain <LSTag Type="Tooltip" Tooltip="Expertise">Expertise</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="Intimidation">Intimidation</LSTag>. After <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_MES_InvokeFire">Invoking Fire</LSTag>, you may <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_MES_Attune">Attune</LSTag> to the flame raging within your soul to become an <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="AVATARSTATEFIRE">Avatar of Fire</LSTag> until your next long rest.

Your <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> increases by 1 and you gain <LSTag Type="Tooltip" Tooltip="Expertise">Expertise</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="Stealth">Stealth</LSTag>. After <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_MES_InvokeCold">Invoking Cold</LSTag>, you may <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_MES_Attune">Attune</LSTag> to the frosted air around you to become an <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="AVATARSTATECOLD">Avatar of Cold</LSTag> until your next long rest.

Your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> increases by 1 and you gain <LSTag Type="Tooltip" Tooltip="Expertise">Expertise</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="Acrobatics">Acrobatics</LSTag>. After <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_MES_InvokeLightning">Invoking Lightning</LSTag>, you may <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_MES_Attune">Attune</LSTag> to the lightning coursing through your veins to become an <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="AVATARSTATELIGHTNING">Avatar of Lightning</LSTag> until your next long rest.

Your <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> increases by 1 and you gain <LSTag Type="Tooltip" Tooltip="Expertise">Expertise</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="Perception">Perception</LSTag>. After <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_MES_InvokeThunder">Invoking Thunder</LSTag>, you may <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_MES_Attune">Attune</LSTag> to the winds surrounding your body to become an <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="AVATARSTATETHUNDER">Avatar of Thunder</LSTag> until your next long rest.
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> Unlock these powerful spells by entering the <LSTag Type="Shout" Tooltip="Shout_MES_Avatar">Avatar State</LSTag>.
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> Unlock these spells by <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_MES_Attune">Attuning</LSTag> to an element.
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> Unlock these spells by <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_MES_Invoke">Invoking</LSTag> an element.
Toggles the molten body and fire particles vfx.
Purge the area in a [1] radius, setting the land ablaze with HOLY FIRE.
Summon a wave of purifying water in a [1] cone, healing allies and pushing back enemies.
